before.name: global_block_whitelist
before.comment: A table which is on each local wiki, which when a row exists indicates that the associated global block is disabled on that local wiki.

columns.name: gbw_id
columns.comment: Key to gb_id in globalblocks database

columns.name: gbw_by
columns.comment: Key to user_id of the user who disabled the block locally.

columns.name: gbw_by_text
columns.comment: The username of the user who disabled the block locally.

columns.name: gbw_reason
columns.comment: The reason given for disabling the global block locally.

columns.name: gbw_expiry
columns.comment: The expiry timestamp for the global block. Blocks can have an infinite expiry.

indexes.name: gbw_by
indexes.comment: Used to find all global blocks disabled by a given user, to allow user merging.
